title: What Was Craziest Thing You Caught Someone Doing?
description:
You caught your partner, child, or dog doing something completely terrible. It caught you off guard, especially what you had to say to them. So today, we want to play a game. You tell us what the infraction was, and we have to guess if it came from your partner, child, or pet.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
